## Release Checklist

- [ ] **Is commit history clean?**
  - Do all commit names start with verbs like `Add`, `Fix`, `Refactor`...?
  - Are all commits passing or marked with `[WIP]`?
- [ ] **Are relevant documentation changes queued up?**
  - Are the Quiltt API Docs updated?
